Sentencas: Three different series of doped ceria-based composite electrolyte consisting of M-doped ceria (M= Ce0.85Er0.15O2-delta (ErDC), Ce(0)(.85)Le(0.15)O(2-delta) (LaDC) and Ce0.95Sr0.05O2-delta (SrDC)) and ternary carbonate (mixture of Li2CO3 , Na2CO3 and K2CO3 ) were developed as functional solid electrolytes for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of M-doped ceria-ternary carbonate composite electrolytes (M = erbium, lanthanum and strontium) for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction, transmission electron microscopy and UV-visible spectroscopy were used to analyze the chemical stability, morphology, and bandgap, respectively, of the prepared composite powders.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of M-doped ceria-ternary carbonate composite electrolytes (M = erbium, lanthanum and strontium) for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: All composite electrolytes exhibited cubic fluorite structure as a primary phase and small peaks corresponding to (Li/Na/K)(2)CO3 as an amorphous phase.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of M-doped ceria-ternary carbonate composite electrolytes (M = erbium, lanthanum and strontium) for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The bulk densities of the sintered composite electrolyte pellets were in the range of 3.34 g/cm(3)-3.45 g/cm(3) .
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of M-doped ceria-ternary carbonate composite electrolytes (M = erbium, lanthanum and strontium) for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The total conductivity of the composite electrolyte materials was evaluated by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy in air and hydrogen (90 vol% N-2 + 10 vol% H-2) in the temperature range of 350 degrees C-650 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of M-doped ceria-ternary carbonate composite electrolytes (M = erbium, lanthanum and strontium) for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The SrDC-ternary carbonate composite electrolyte showed the highest conductivity of 0.092 Scm(-1) and lowest activation energy at 650 degrees C in hydrogen.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of M-doped ceria-ternary carbonate composite electrolytes (M = erbium, lanthanum and strontium) for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The formation of hydrated phase from chemical interaction between the carbonates and hydrogen gas and the presence of Sr2+ and cerium ions is useful in enhancing the proton conduction in the SrDC-ternary carbonate system.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of M-doped ceria-ternary carbonate composite electrolytes (M = erbium, lanthanum and strontium) for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
